word_mean: 保留器，保持器，固位体：使某物保留或保持在位的器具
义齿的一个部分，它可以其桥部与桥基齿联合，例如嵌体、部分冠或全冠
一种将牙齿和上下颌骨保持在位的正牙装置
用于固定或稳定假体装置的任何一型卡环、固位体或其他器具
固定假体将桥体附着于对桥基齿的部分

sentence.Network_en: I found the gardener, a family retainer, morosely surveying the scene.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发现这个园丁——家里一个服侍多年的仆人，愁眉苦脸地审视着这个场景。

sentence.Network_cn: 利兹每月得到一笔预付金。

entry.def: A retainer is a fee that you pay to someone in order to make sure that they will be available to do work for you if you need them to.

example.ex: Liz was being paid a regular monthly retainer.
example.tran: 利兹每月得到一笔预付金。

entry.def: A servant who has been with one family for a long time can be referred to as a retainer .

example.ex: I found the gardener, a family retainer, morosely surveying the scene.
example.tran: 我发现这个园丁——家里一个服侍多年的仆人，愁眉苦脸地审视着这个场景。

means.word_mean: 1. a fee charged in advance to retain the services of someone
2. a person working in the service of another (especially in the household)
3. a dental appliance that holds teeth (or a prosthesis) in position after orthodontic treatment

auth_sentence.content: One loyal retainer's job was to move the chairs for us, even if it was just a matter of inches.
auth_sentence.res_content: One loyal retainer's job was to move the chairs for us, even if it was just a matter of inches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One loyal retainer's job was to move the chairs for us, even if it was just a matter of inches.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Whyte's lawyers said its client had never been a close business associate of Kevin Sykes, and denied paying him a retainer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr Whyte's lawyers said its client had never been a close business associate of Kevin Sykes, and denied paying him a retainer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Whyte's lawyers said its client had never been a close business associate of Kevin Sykes, and denied paying him a retainer.

auth_sentence.content: Like many, New York publicist Nicola Parish charges an annual retainer fee for her services.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like many, New York publicist Nicola Parish charges an annual retainer fee for her services.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like many, New York publicist Nicola Parish charges an annual retainer fee for her services.
